dmca.title: TV DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market
dmca.principal_name: Leigh Francis aka Keith Lemon & Hat Trick

works.description:
The two apps linked above have BOTH been 

ripped off by this developer in their sole 2 apps on store. They are  
deliberately targeting our success. We have tracked the release of these  
apps around other android markets and have ended up here.
The link to the infringing material is the google lay developer account - 

both apps there are infringing to our material, our apps, our clients IP  
(which we manage and have rights too)

Please remove them asap and shut the developer down - they are purely  
around to rip of other peoples brands.
